{"id":506326363,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1623404755,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/506326363/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeGood(string s) {\n        string ans;\n        for (auto x: s) {\n            if (!ans.empty() && tolower(x) == tolower(ans[ans.size()-1]) && x != ans[ans.size()-1]) ans.pop_back();\n            else ans.push_back(x);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great"}
